abstract: In pursuit of growth and profits, BP has taken risks and suffered consequences. But its record shows that it has been unable or unwilling to learn from its expensive mistakes.
snippet: In pursuit of growth and profits, BP has taken risks and suffered consequences. But its record shows that it has been unable or unwilling to learn from its expensive mistakes.
lead_paragraph: This article was reported by Sarah Lyall, Clifford Krauss and Jad Mouawad and written by Ms. Lyall.

headline.main: In BP’s Record, a History of  Boldness and  Costly Blunders
headline.print_headline: In BP’s Record, a History Of Boldness and Blunders
